lena.mueller@example.com · +49 123 456 789
Profil

2019-01-01 → 2023-12-31 · Berlin, Germany
As the Senior UX Designer at Acme GmbH, I led the design of complex web applications and
mobile apps, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver user-centric soluti

ss-functional teams to deliver user-centric solutions. I
conducted user research, created detailed wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes, and iteratively
refined the UI based on user feedback. My designs consistently achieved high customer
satisfaction scores and contributed to significant increases in user engagement and conversion
rates.
UX Designer — Startup XYZ
2016-06-01 → 2018-12-31 · Berlin, Germany
At Startup XYZ, I was responsible for the end-to-end UX design of a SaaS platform for sm

the end-to-end UX design of a SaaS platform for small
businesses. I conducted user interviews, created personas, and developed a cohesive design
system that enabled rapid prototyping and iterative development. My designs helped the startup
achieve a 30% increase in user retention and a 20% boost in revenue within the first year.
UX Designer — Freelance
2014-01-01 → 2016-05-31 · Berlin, Germany
As a freelance UX Designer, I worked with a variety of clients across different industries, including
e

f clients across different industries, including
e-commerce, fintech, and healthcare. I helped them improve the user experience of their digital
products, from conducting user research to designing intuitive interfaces. My work resulted in
increased user satisfaction, higher conversion rates, and better overall business outcomes for my
clients.

lopment team to implement automated deployment workflows, leveraging tools like Jenkins
